```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
```

```{r}
data(iso3166)   # saves iso3166 encoding of a2, a3, mapnames, regionnames
world_coordinates <- map_data("world")   # map data of world in point form
colors <- read_csv("colors.csv") %>%  # color data from my coloring program
  mutate(a2 = Name) %>% 
  inner_join(iso3166,by="a2") %>% 
  mutate(region=mapname)
world_map <- world_coordinates %>% 
  left_join(colors, by="region")

ggplot() +
  geom_map(data=world_map, map=world_map, aes(long,lat,map_id=region, fill=Color))

```
